name: latest

name: v1.2.2

name: v1.2.1
body:
## Commits

name: v1.2.0
body:
- new option to exclude interface
- fixed dynamic prefix injection
- fixed volatile.sqlite update trouble
- fixed Debian build dependencies
- fixed documentation
- fixed reuse lease

name: v1.0.9
body: - fixed overwrite of SQLite DB when upgrading

name: v1.0.8
body:
## Commits
- 9f228d2: try to fix empty addresses transmitted by clients (Henri Wahl)
- 802cd48: colonify_ip6 instead of len(32) (Henri Wahl)
- cd2d9b5: 1.0.8 (Henri Wahl)

name: v1.0.7
body:
## Commits
- 72c7e2a: fix for https://github.com/HenriWahl/dhcpy6d/issues/47 (Henri Wahl)
- 1561a64: 1.0.7 (Henri Wahl)

name: v1.0.6
body:
## Commits
- 2b7e3bf: fixed https://github.com/HenriWahl/dhcpy6d/issues/41 (Henri Wahl)
- 2c05a2a: removed '== 1' for cfg.DNS_UPDATE (Henri Wahl)
- 2821657: replaced h.wahl@ifw-dresden.de by henri@dhcpy6d.de (Henri Wahl)
- 01066d9: Fixed marking textfile storage as connected when no fixed addresses are configured (Felix Jacobi) [#46](https://github.com/HenriWahl/dhcpy6d/pull/46)
- 808b67d: fixed DB updates (Henri Wahl)
- 99cee03: 1.0.6 (Henri Wahl)

name: v1.0.5
body:
## Commits
- 795157b: update Python to 3.9 (Henri Wahl)
- 556490f: added listify_option (Henri Wahl)
- 025b3e2: fixed inability to configure multiple MACs per host in DB (Henri Wahl)
- 18408e0: prepare 1.0.5 (Henri Wahl)

name: v1.0.4
body:
- fixed default behavior of route_link_local=no in clients.conf
- include empty volatile.sqlite, because database is built by dhcpy6d anyway

name: v1.0.3
body: - added option DNS_USE_RNDC

name: v1.0.2
body: - fixed NTP_SERVER_DICT

name: v1.0.1
body: - fix mandatory logfile (https://github.com/HenriWahl/dhcpy6d/issues/29)

name: v1.0
body:
- added EUI64 address category
- added PXE boot support
- added support for fixed prefix per client config
- added address category dns to retrieve client ipv6 from DNS
- added self-creation of database tables
- improved PostgreSQL support
- migrated to Python 3
- code housekeeping
- fixes of course...
- added ignore_mac option to work with ppp interfaces
- fix for MySQLdb.IntegrityError
- fixed recycling of prefixes

- Prefix delegation now REALLY works
- Routes for prefixes get set and removed - even after a reboot
- Allow to inject a dynamically changed prefix at runtime
- Added support for option 56 – NTP servers
- Added support for request limits to mitigate wild clients
- Allow to ignore unknown clients
- Fixes and optimizations

- Allow using PostgreSQL database for volatile and config storage
- Added –prefix option to be used for dynamic prefixes
- Added category ‘dns’ for DNS-based IP-address retrieval
- Systemd-integration for CentOS 7 and Debian 8
- Reply CONFIRM requests with NotOnLink to force clients to get new address

- autocommit to MySQL
- fixed fixed addresses
- some optimization in tidy-up-thread
- small fixes

- fixed usage of fixed addresses in dhcpy6d-clients.conf
- fixed DNSUpdate() to update default class clients too
- show warning if deprecated prefix_length is used in address definitions
- set socket to non-blocking to avoid freeze
- increase MAC/LLIP cache time from 30s to 300s because of laggy clients
- removed useless prefix length
- retry query on MySQL reconnect bugfix

- fixed nonworking VLANs
- smal code cleaning

- listen on VLAN interfaces
- access neighbor cache natively on Linux
- allows empty answers
- do not cache MAC/LLIP addresses longterm as default
- ability to generate server DUID
- complete manpages
- more complete configuration correctness checks
- fixed single address definition error
Added ability to run daemon as non-privileged user and group.
